title: ESET
extract: ESET is an IT security company that offers anti-virus and firewall products such as ESET NOD32. It was founded in 1987. ESET is headquartered in Bratislava, Slovakia, and was awarded the recognition of the most successful Slovak company in 2008, 2009 and in 2010. It plays a significant role in overall Cybersecurity.
extract_html: ESET is an IT security company that offers anti-virus and firewall products such as ESET NOD32. It was founded in 1987. ESET is headquartered in Bratislava, Slovakia, and was awarded the recognition of the most successful Slovak company in 2008, 2009 and in 2010. It plays a significant role in overall Cybersecurity.
